FuncDef: The reset ip urpf discard statistics command resets the statistics on the packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded.
CLIs: reset { ip | ipv6 } urpf discard statistics [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of an installed interface board.
If [ slot slot-id ] is not specified, the statistics on packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded on all interface boards are cleared.If [ slot slot-id ] is specified, the statistics on packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded on the specified interface board are cleared.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 31.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running the reset ip urpf discard statistics command resets the statistics on the packets that fail the URPF check and are discarded. Therefore, confirm the action before running the reset ip urpf discard statistics command.
